post.title: Wednesday Links - Edition 2021-03-31
post.body_html:
Crazy JVM internals (45s read) 🥸
https://twitter.com/tagir_valeev/status/1377154908084785155

Gradle's class loader hierarchy in a nutshell (6 min read) 🧐
https://dev.to/autonomousapps/abusing-gradle-s-class-loader-hierarchy-for-fun-and-profit-oca

Suitable JVM for async-profiler (45s read) 🔬
https://twitter.com/AndreiPangin/status/1377014949659164672?s=20

HTTP Cookies clearly explained (256s listen) 🍪
https://256.nurkiewicz.com/38

The AdoptOpenJDK is dead, long live the Eclipse Adoptium! (3 min read) 🛠
https://www.infoq.com/news/2021/03/eclipse-adoptium-established/

How to use JSPI? (13 min read) 🚚
https://reflectoring.io/service-provider-interface/

viktor - Kotlin's library for efficient array operations (10 min read) 🧬
https://blog.jetbrains.com/kotlin/2021/03/viktor-efficient-vectorized-computations-in-kotlin/
